subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Retired pro mountain biker Dave Wiens is the reigning champion of the Leadville 100 mile off-road race.  This year he went head to head with retired pro road cyclist Lance Armstrong.
snippet: Retired pro mountain biker Dave Wiens is the reigning champion of the Leadville 100 mile off-road race.  This year he went head to head with retired pro road cyclist Lance Armstrong.
